text: yeogsi nam-aissneun se salam-e gedo gwan-yong-i bepul-eojyeossdeola ittaeneun neolbdalan jiguga geudeul-eul abbaghayeoss-eu ni geulo inhayeo geudeul-ui yeongheundo go chungseuleowoss-euni hananim oeeneun peonan cheoga eobs-eum-ila saeng-gaghayeoss-euni hana nim-eun geudeul-i hoegaehadolog geudeul-ege gwan-yong-eul bepusyeossdoda sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasim-ila
